data.title: Find the EIIN, Location and Phone Number of All Colleges in Bangladesh
data.meta_description: Your one-stop resource for finding EIIN, location, and contact numbers of all colleges in Bangladesh. Navigate our user-friendly database and find the information you need in no time.

Open Table of contents

Introduction

What is EIIN?

How to Find the EIIN of a College

How to Find the Contact Details of a College

How to Use This Table

Video Tutorial

Introduction

Are you a student, parent, or educator looking for the EIIN and contact details of colleges in Bangladesh? If so, you’ve come to the right place! In this blog post, we will guide you on how to access this information effortlessly through our searchable database.

What is EIIN?

EIIN stands for Educational Institute Identification Number. It is a unique identifier assigned to all educational institutions in Bangladesh. The EIIN is used to track and manage educational institutions, and it is also used for a variety of other purposes, such as admissions, scholarships, and government grants. To learn more about the EIIN number please click here.

To find any educational institution’s EIIN click here to get the list of all institution’s EIIN.

How to Find the EIIN of a College

There are a few ways to find the EIIN of a college in Bangladesh. One way is to contact the college directly. The college will be able to provide you with their EIIN. Another way to find the EIIN of a college is to use our searchable database. Simply enter the name of the college in the search bar, and our database will return the EIIN of the college.

Once you have the EIIN of a college, you can use our searchable database to find the contact details of the college. Simply enter the EIIN of the college in the search bar, and our database will return the contact details of the college, including the phone number, address, and email address.

How to Use This Table

Now, let’s dive into how you can use our searchable database. It’s simple and user-friendly. All you need to do is enter the name of the college you’re looking for in the search bar. The database will then display the EIIN, location, and contact details of the college. You can also filter the results by location, making it easier to find colleges in a specific area. Click the “+” button to the left to see the whole table.

Video Tutorial

Here is also a video tutorial on how you can find EIIN, contact info and address of any college in Bangladesh.
